note_chs: 扔/丢，形容这个动作根据不同动作力度和动机有不同用法。
note_en: The word "throw" or "drop" has different uses depending on the force and motivation of the action.

en: Take out the garbage / put the garbage / dump the garbage /trash out the garbage
note_en: Throwing things, throwing them outwards, has power.
variants_chs: 扔/丢+sth 一般东西往外扔，带有力度

en: throw it over here/Toss it over/throw past/threw past
note_chs: 用很快的速度扔/丢过来，扔来自己身边
推动 吴卓羲标志名言“唔好ong”，不要推的意思
名词，路边摊、摆摊的意思

chs: 不服输/明知错不认/爱面子
en: The dead chicken forcing thelid of the rice pot open
note_chs: 歇后语不服输；明知自己错了，但为了面子都要装没事、不认错，给人看穿了都不认。
note_en: (ldiom) (V) To refuse toadmit one's mistake evenwhen it is obvious
variants_chs: 形容词 通常特指人的行为
variants_en: Adjectives usually refer specifically to human behavior.
